Manila to assert sovereign rights in West Philippine Sea amid COVID-19 crisis -- Palace tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-735275 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/735275/manila-to-assert-sovereign-rights-in-west-philippine-sea-amid-covid-19-crisis-palace/story/ “Ang filing ng diplomatic protest ginagawa po yan basta kinakailangang gawin, ke may COVID ke wala, tayo po y mananatili na pu-protektahan at itataguyod ang ating national territory at ang ating sovereign rights,” presidential spokesperson Harry Roque said when asked about the timing of the protest. DOH prepares for typhoon-related diseases while handling COVID-19 crisis tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-735273 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/735273/doh-prepares-for-typhoon-related-diseases-while-handling-covid-19-crisis/story/ "Mayroon tayong dalawang pathway--ang isa 'yung COVID pathway at non-COVID pathway. Ating ine-educate ang ating local governments na dapat mayroon din silang pathway for the non-COVID services," Health Undersecretary Maria Rosario Vergeire said in a virtual conference. "Ito 'yung mga sakit o ibang mga services na dapat i-offer pa rin ng ating healthcare in spite of us having this crisis with COVID at kasama na diyan 'yung dengue," she added. Thu, 23 Apr 2020 13:46:09 +0800
DILG urges PNP to protect barangay officials from harassment of ECQ violators tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-735272 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/735272/dilg-urges-pnp-to-protect-barangay-officials-from-harassment-of-ecq-violators/story/ "Kami ay nakipag-ugnayan na rin sa Philippine National Police, nakiusap po kami at nagbigay ng direktiba si Secretary Eduardo Año sa Philippine National Police na bantayan o kaya naman ay suportahan ang ating mga barangay officials, protektahan sila sa mga ganitong klaseng insidente," DILG spokesman Undersecretary Jonathan Malaya said at a Laging Handa press briefing. Thu, 23 Apr 2020 13:38:12 +0800
